name: Catastrophe
description: You fire a ray of catastrophic chaos at a creature within a short (10 unit) distance. If they fail a defense check of 9, they suffer 10 aetheric damage plus 3 additional aetheric damage per condition currently affecting them. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, one of their conditions is transferred to you (chosen randomly if multiple).
charge: Instead of dealing damage, this spell becomes an execute. If the target fails their defense check and has conditions equal to or greater than their tier threshold, they die instantly: Minion (1+ conditions), Grunt (2+ conditions), Standard (3+ conditions), Champion (4+ conditions). Elite, Legend, and Mythic creatures cannot be executed.
